name: calculator-sse-demo
description: Educational MCP server demonstrating the legacy HTTP + SSE transport pattern. Features a full calculator with math operations, constants, history tracking, and interactive tutorials. Perfect for learning about deprecated SSE transport vs modern alternatives.
author: Yigit Konur

tools.description: Perform mathematical calculations with support for basic arithmetic, power, and modulo operations

tools.description: Get detailed explanations of mathematical operations and concepts

educationalValue: Demonstrates legacy SSE transport pattern, session management, and why modern transports are preferred. Includes comprehensive MCP feature implementation following golden standard practices.
